feed.title: Track Awesome Postgres Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome PostgreSQL software, libraries, tools and resources, inspired by awesome-mysql

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Jun 27, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / Optimization

  • pgassistant (‚≠ê1.4k) - A DB optimization dashboard for PostgreSQL with LLM and pgTune integration.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Jun 03, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / High-Availability

  • pgrwl (‚≠ê67) - Stream write-ahead logs (WAL) from a PostgreSQL server in real time. A drop-in, container-friendly alternative to pg_receivewal.

Contents / Backups

  • pg-backups-to-s3 (‚≠ê17) - Docker-first solution on top of pg_dump with support for environment-based configuration for scheduled PostgreSQL backups with optional compression, GPG encryption, webhooks, automatic upload to Amazon S3.

Contents / Utilities

  • flyway - Schema migration tool for Postgres and others.
  • ScaffoldHub.io - Generate fullstack PostgreSQL apps with Angular, Vue or React (Commercial Software).

Resources / Blogs

  • Digoal's PostgreSQL and Technical blog(Chinese Language) (‚≠ê8.3k)

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 25, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / Docker images

  • paradedb/paradedb - ParadeDB is Postgres for Search and Analytics. Based on the Bitnami Postgres container with pg_search and pg_analytics Postgres extensions.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 23, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / CLI

  • pdot - Visualize and explore database structures in your shell, from high-context views of the foreign key graph to trigger cascades, role inheritance and permissions, and many more

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 06, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / Backups

  • pgbackweb (‚≠ê1.7k) - A Complete Docker-based Postgres backup and maintenance tool with Web UI.

Contents / Server

  • Apache Cloudberry (‚≠ê998) - And MPP PostgreSQL fork. Open source alternative to Greenplum Database.
  • Postgres-XL - Scalable Open Source PostgreSQL-based Database Cluster.

Contents / Extensions

  • pgcat (‚≠ê385) - Enhanced PostgreSQL logical replication

Contents / Work Queues

  • BeanQueue (‚≠ê18) - A Python work queue framework based on SKIP LOCKED, LISTEN and NOTIFY
  • pgmq (‚≠ê3.4k) - A lightweight message queue. Like AWS SQS and RSMQ but on Postgres.
  • river (‚≠ê4.2k) - A high-performance job processing system for Go and Postgres.

Contents / Optimization

  • aqo (‚≠ê466) - Adaptive query optimization for PostgreSQL.

Contents / Utilities

  • NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql (‚≠ê43) - The NServiceBus.Transport.PostgreSql library allows .NET developers to use a PostgreSQL database as a message broker. (Commerical Software)
  • planter (‚≠ê553) - Generate PlantUML ER diagram textual description from PostgreSQL tables

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 30, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / High-Availability

  • autobase (‚≠ê2.8k) - Autobase for PostgreSQL¬Æ is an open-source DBaaS that automates the deployment and management of highly available PostgreSQL clusters.

Contents / Backups

  • pgbackup-sidecar (‚≠ê4) - pgbackup-sidecar is a lightweight Docker sidecar container designed to automate regular backups of a PostgreSQL database using pg_dump, cron, and bash scripts while also sending output to a webhook.

Contents / GUI

  • Redash (‚≠ê28k) - Connect to any data source, easily visualize and share your data.

Contents / Extensions

  • pg_analytics (‚≠ê522) - pg_analytics is an extension that accelerates analytical query processing inside Postgres to a performance level comparable to dedicated OLAP databases.
  • pg_barcode (‚≠ê1) - PostgreSQL SVG QRcode & Datamatrix generator.

Contents / Optimization

  • PEV2 (‚≠ê3k) - Online Postgres Explain Visualizer.

Contents / Utilities

  • pg-spot-operator (‚≠ê58) - A daemon to run stateful Postgres on cheap AWS Spot VMs
  • pgroll (‚≠ê5.1k) - Zero-downtime, reversible, schema migrations for Postgres
  • RegreSQL (‚≠ê283) - Tool to build, maintain and execute a regression testing suite for SQL queries.

Contents / Language bindings

  • Go: pq (‚≠ê9.5k), pgx (‚≠ê12k), go-pg (‚≠ê5.7k)
  • Lua: luapgsql (‚≠ê115)
  • Python: psycopg2, asyncpg, pg8000
  • R: RPostgres (‚≠ê338), RPostgreSQL (‚≠ê66)
  • TypeScript: zapatos (‚≠ê1.4k)

Contents / Kubernetes

  • Crunchy Operator (‚≠ê4.2k) - Production PostgreSQL for Kubernetes, from high availability Postgres clusters to full-scale database-as-a-service.
  • Fujitsu Enterprise Postgres for Kubernetes - Enterprise-grade PostgreSQL on OpenShift Container Platform (Commercial Software).
  • Kubegres Operator (‚≠ê1.3k) - Kubegres is a Kubernetes operator allowing to deploy one or many clusters of PostgreSql instances and manage databases replication, failover and backup.
  • StackGres Operator (‚≠ê1.2k) - Full Stack PostgreSQL on Kubernetes.
  • Zalando Operator (‚≠ê4.8k) - Creates and manages PostgreSQL clusters running in Kubernetes.
  • CloudNativePG operator (‚≠ê6.3k) - A comprehensive platform designed to seamlessly manage PostgreSQL databases within Kubernetes environments.
  • KubeDB operator - Run Production-Grade Databases on Kubernetes (Commercial Software).

Resources / Tutorials

  • Operations cheat sheet - Operations cheat sheet from PostgreSQL Wiki.

Resources / Books

  • The Internals of PostgreSQL - A free e-book by Hironobu Suzuki
  • PostgreSQL 14 Internals - A free e-book by Egor Rogov

Resources / External lists

  • Wikipedia admin tools list - Comparison of database administration tools on Wikipedia
  • PostgreSQL Wiki GUI tools list - Community Guide to PostgreSQL GUI Tools
  • PostgreSQL Wiki Foreign Data Wrappers list - Foreign data wrappers

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 29, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / GUI

  • DBConvert Streams - A cloud-native platform for real-time data migration and CDC replication between PostgreSQL and MySQL databases across various cloud environments. (Commercial Software).
  • DbVisualizer - Cross-platform database client for developers, DBAs, and analysts (Commercial Software).

Contents / Security

  • Acra (‚≠ê1.4k) - SQL database security suite: proxy for data protection with transparent "on the fly" data encryption, SQL firewall (SQL injections prevention), intrusion detection system.

Contents / Monitoring

  • coroot (‚≠ê6.6k) - Coroot is an open-source APM & Observability tool, a DataDog and NewRelic alternative. Powered by eBPF for rapid insights into system performance.
  • Datadog - SaaS monitoring that collects and visualizes metrics, queries, and explain plans, and sends alerts when problems are encountered (Commercial Software).
  • postgres_exporter (‚≠ê3.1k) - Prometheus exporter for PostgreSQL server metrics.

Contents / Extensions

  • OrioleDB - The cloud-native storage engine for PostgreSQL. OrioleDB is a PostgreSQL extension that combines the advantages of both on-disk and in-memory engines.
  • pg_stat_monitor (‚≠ê517) - Query Performance Monitoring tool for PostgreSQL.
  • pg_squeeze (‚≠ê564) - An extension for automatic bloat cleanup with minimal locking.
  • ParadeDB (‚≠ê7.3k) - Postgres for Search and Analytics

Contents / Utilities

  • GatewayD (‚≠ê263) - Cloud-native database gateway and framework for building data-driven applications. Like API gateways, for databases.
  • migra (‚≠ê3k) - Like diff but for Postgres schemas.
  • pg_timetable (‚≠ê1.2k) - Advanced job scheduler for PostgreSQL.
  • Pyrseas (‚≠ê403) - Postgres database schema versioning.

Contents / Language bindings

  • Java: PostgreSQL JDBC Driver, Vert.x PostgreSQL Client

Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Nile - Fully managed PostgreSQL . Nile decouples storage from compute and virtualizes tenants to ship multi-tenant AI applications fast, safe, and with limitless scale. Free tier provides unlimited databases.

Resources / Tutorials

  • pagila (‚≠ê64) - Pagila, Postgres Sample Database

Resources / Blogs

  • Percona's PostgreSQL blog posts

Resources / Newsletters

  • pgMustard newsletter - Monthly newsletter that contains Postgres performance articles and videos.

Resources / Podcasts

  • PostgresFM - Weekly discussions about Postgres topics.
  • Path to Citus Con - Monthly interviews with people in the Postgres world.

Resources / Videos

  • PostgresTV Youtube channel - Postgres talks, hacking sessions, interviews, and podcast episodes

Resources / Community

  • Slack - Slack workspace for Postgres with over 20k members
  • Discord - A Discord server for Postgres with over 6k members

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 28, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / Optimization

  • EverSQL - Automated query optimization tool, monitoring and analysis tool, indexing recommendation tool. (Commercial Software)

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 08, 2025
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • OVHcloud Cloud Databases - Highly available, scalable, and secured PostgreSQL. Daily backups with point-in-time recovery, no lock-in, free incoming and outgoing traffic.

  • Luna Modeler - Cross-platform desktop data modeling tool (Commercial Software).

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 18, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • pg_lakehouse (‚≠ê7.3k) - pg_lakehouse is an extension that transforms Postgres into an analytical query engine over object stores like AWS S3/GCS and table formats like Delta Lake/Iceberg.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 22, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • pg_search (‚≠ê7.3k) - pg_search is a PostgreSQL extension that enables full-text search over SQL tables using the BM25 algorithm, the state-of-the-art ranking function for full-text search.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Mar 11, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / GUI

  • Teable (‚≠ê19k) - A Super fast, Real-time, Professional, Developer friendly, No code database.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Mar 04, 2024
entry.content:
Contents / CLI

  • pg-schema-diff (‚≠ê523) - CLI (and Golang library) for diffing Postgres schemas and generating SQL migrations with minimal locking.

Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Supabase - Fully managed Postgres with read replicas, point-in-time-recovery, support packages, browser based GUI, and a generous free tier.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Jun 05, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 28, 2023

  • pgMagicü™Ñ - Chat to Postgres in Natural Language (Commercial Software).

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 12, 2023
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • PostgresML - Machine learning and AI inside your database, including vectors, LLMs, and classic ML. Train, predict and manage the entire lifecycle of machine learning models using only SQL.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 23, 2023
entry.content:
Contents / CLI

  • atlas (‚≠ê7k) - Atlas is a tool for managing and migrating database schemas using modern DevOps principles.

  • YugabyteDB - Open Source Distributed SQL using a fork of PostgreSQL on top of distributed storage and transaction

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Aug 31, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Render Managed PostgreSQL - Secure, reliable, and completely hands-off managed PostgreSQL. Encryption at rest, automated backups, and expandable SSD storage included in all plans. Plans start at $7 per month for 256MB RAM and 1GB storage (free for first 90 days).

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Jun 02, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / Distributions

  • Pigsty (‚≠ê4.1k) - Battery-Included Open-Source Distribution for PostgreSQL with ultimate observability & Database-as-Code toolbox for developers.

Contents / Monitoring

  • pg_exporter (‚≠ê248) - Fully customizable Prometheus exporter for PostgreSQL & Pgbouncer with fine-grained execution control.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 12, 2022
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • ScaleGrid PostgreSQL DBaaS - Fully managed PostgreSQL hosting with high availability, dedicated servers, and superuser control on the #1 multi-cloud Amazon RDS alternative.

  • wal-e (‚≠ê3.5k) (obsolete) - Simple Continuous Archiving for PostgreSQL to S3, Azure, or Swift by Heroku.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Oct 12, 2021
entry.content:

  • pgMonitor (‚≠ê658) - Postgres metrics collection and visualization that can be deployed to bare metal, virtual machines, or Kubernetes.

Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Crunchy Bridge - Fully managed Postgres from the Postgres experts. Available across all major cloud providers: Amazon AWS, Google GCP, Microsoft Azure. No lock-in with full super-user support.

entry.content:

  • Beekeeper Studio - Free and open source SQL client with a modern UI and great Postgres support. Cross platform.

  • Chartbrew - Create live dashboards, charts, and client reports from PostgreSQL data. Features a query tool that works with SQL.

entry.content:

  • Scaleway Managed Database - Fully managed PostgreSQL databases with HA, scaling, and automated backups, hosted in the EU. Starting at ‚Ç¨10 per month.

entry.content:
Contents / Monitoring

  • dexter (‚≠ê2k) - The automatic indexer for Postgres. Detects slow queries and creates indexes if configured to do so.

Contents / Extensions

  • pg_cron (‚≠ê3.4k) - Run periodic jobs in PostgreSQL.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Oct 07, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Google Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL - Fully-managed database service that makes it easy to set up, maintain, manage, and administer your PostgreSQL relational databases on Google Cloud Platform.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Sep 17, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • PGAudit - The PostgreSQL Audit Extension (or pgaudit) provides detailed session and/or object audit logging via the standard logging facility provided by PostgreSQL.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Sep 02, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / GUI

  • DataRow - Cross-platform SQL Client for Amazon Redshift: Simple, Effortless, Extensible.
  • PostgresCompare - Cross-platform database comparison and deployment tool (Commercial Software).

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 22, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / High-Availability

  • Slony-I - "Master to multiple slaves" replication system with cascading and failover.

Contents / Utilities

  • pg_docs_bot (‚≠ê18) - Browser extension to redirect PostgreSQL docs links to the current version.
  • pg-differ (‚≠ê38) - Tool for easy initialization / updating of the structure of PostgreSQL tables, migration alternative (Node.js).

Resources / Blogs

  • Bruce Momjian's PostgreSQL blog

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 25, 2020
entry.content:
Contents / Backups

  • wal-g (‚≠ê3.6k) - The successor of WAL-E rewritten in Go. Currently supports cloud object storage services by AWS (S3), Google Cloud (GCS), Azure, as well as OpenStack Swift, MinIO, and file system storages. Supports block-level incremental backups, offloading backup tasks to a standby server, provides parallelization and throttling options. In addition to Postgres, WAL-G can be used for MySQL and MongoDB databases.

Contents / CLI

  • pgsh (‚≠ê590) - Branch your PostgreSQL Database like Git
  • schemaspy (‚≠ê3.4k) - SchemaSpy is a JAVA JDBC-compliant tool for generating your database to HTML documentation, including Entity Relationship diagrams

Contents / Monitoring

  • PMM (‚≠ê797) - Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM) is a Free and Open Source platform for monitoring and managing PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
  • pgmetrics - pgmetrics is an open-source, zero-dependency, single-binary tool that can collect a lot of information and statistics from a running PostgreSQL server and display it in easy-to-read text format or export it as JSON and CSV for scripting.
  • okmeter.io - Commercial SaaS agent-based monitoring with a very detailed PostgreSQL plugin. It automatically gathers 100s of stats, displays dashboards on every aspect and sends alerts when something goes wrong (Commercial Software).

Contents / Extensions

  • PipelineDB - A PostgreSQL extension that runs SQL queries continuously on streams, incrementally storing results in tables.

Contents / Optimization

  • pg_flame (‚≠ê1.6k) - A flamegraph generator for query plans.
  • TimescaleDB Tune (‚≠ê472) - a program for tuning a TimescaleDB database to perform its best based on the host's resources such as memory and number of CPUs.

Contents / Utilities

  • Hasura GraphQL Engine (‚≠ê32k) - Blazing fast, instant realtime GraphQL APIs on Postgres with fine grained access control, also trigger webhooks on database events.
  • pg_activity (‚≠ê2.6k) - top like application for PostgreSQL server activity monitoring.
  • PgBouncer - Lightweight connection pooler for PostgreSQL.
  • pgpool-II - Middleware that provides connection pooling, replication, load balancing and limiting exceeding connections.

Contents / Language bindings

  • Node: node-postgres (‚≠ê13k), pg-promise (‚≠ê3.5k), pogi (‚≠ê140), slonik (‚≠ê4.8k), postgres (‚≠ê8.1k)
  • Ruby: pg (‚≠ê822)

Resources / Articles

  • the ultimate postgres vs mysql blog post
  • Superfast CSV imports using PostgreSQL's COPY command

Resources / Videos

  • Postgres Conference Youtube channel - Conference videos

Resources / Community

  • Mailing lists - Official mailing lists for Postgres for support, outreach, and more. One of the primary channels of communication in the Postgres community.
  • Reddit - A reddit community for PostgreSQL users with over 12000 users
  • #postgresql on Freenode - The most popular IRC channel about Postgres on Freenode with over 1000 users

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Nov 23, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • PGroonga - PGroonga provides a new index access method that uses Groonga allowing super fast full text search feature against all languages.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Sep 03, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / GUI

  • TablePlus - Native App which let you edit database and structure. High-end security ensured (Commercial Software).

Contents / Optimization

  • pgMustard - A modern user interface for EXPLAIN, that also provides performance tips (Commercial Software).

Contents / Utilities

  • postgres-checkup - a new-generation diagnostics tool that allows users to collect deep analysis of the health of a Postgres database.

Resources / Videos

  • Scaling Postgres - Postgres video blog series by Creston Jamison

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Jun 28, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / Utilities

  • pg_insights (‚≠ê303) - Convenient SQL for monitoring Postgres database health.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on May 12, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • Citus (‚≠ê12k) - Scalable PostgreSQL cluster for real-time workloads.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 16, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • TimescaleDB - Open-source time-series database fully compatible with Postgres, distributed as extension

Resources / Tutorials

  • pg-utils (‚≠ê1.1k) - Useful DBA tools by Data Egret

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 07, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. It provides builtin HA, elastic scaling and native integration with Azure ecosystem.
  • DigitalOcean Managed Databases - Fully managed PostgreSQL databases. No free plan. Starting at $15/mo. Daily backups with point-in-time recovery. Standby nodes with auto-failover.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Apr 05, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / PaaS (PostgreSQL as a Service)

  • Aiven PostgreSQL - PostgreSQL as a service in AWS, Azure, DigitalOcean, Google Cloud and UpCloud; plans range from $19/month single node instances to large highly-available setups, free trial for two weeks.
  • Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL - Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) for PostgreSQL
  • Database Labs - Get a production-ready cloud PostgreSQL server in minutes, from $20 a month Backups, monitoring, patches, and 24/7 tech support all included.
  • Heroku Postgres - Plans from free to huge, operated by PostgreSQL experts. Does not require running your app on Heroku. Free plan includes 10,000 rows, 20 connections, up to two backups, and has PostGIS support.

Contents / Docker images

  • citusdata/citus - Citus official images with citus extensions. Based on the official Postgres container.
  • mdillon/postgis - PostGIS 2.3 on Postgres 9. Based on the official Postgres container.
  • postgres - Official postgres container (from Docker)

Resources / Documentation

  • Wiki - user documentation, how-tos, and tips 'n' tricks

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Mar 31, 2019
entry.content:
Contents / Extensions

  • pgRouting (‚≠ê1.3k) - pgRouting extends the PostGIS/PostgreSQL geospatial database to provide geospatial routing and other network analysis functionality.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Dec 06, 2018
entry.content:
Contents / High-Availability

  • pglookout (‚≠ê184) - Replication monitoring and failover daemon.

Contents / Backups

  • Barman - Backup and Recovery Manager for PostgreSQL by 2ndQuadrant.
  • pgBackRest - Reliable PostgreSQL Backup & Restore.
  • pghoard (‚≠ê1.3k) - Backup and restore tool for cloud object stores (AWS S3, Azure, Google Cloud, OpenStack Swift).

  • DBeaver - Universal Database Manager with excellent support for PostgreSQL.

Contents / Distributions

  • Postgres.app - The Easiest Way to Get Started with PostgreSQL on macOS.

Contents / Extensions

  • pg_partman (‚≠ê2.4k) - Partition management extension for PostgreSQL.
  • pgTAP - Database testing framework for Postgres

Contents / Optimization

  • PoWA - PostgreSQL Workload Analyzer gathers performance stats and provides real-time charts and graphs to help monitor and tune your PostgreSQL servers.

Contents / Utilities

  • PostgREST (‚≠ê25k) - Serves a fully RESTful API from any existing PostgreSQL database.
  • sqitch (‚≠ê3k) - Tool for managing versioned schema deployment

  • Michael Paquier's blog
  • Robert Haas' blog

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Nov 13, 2018
entry.content:
Contents / GUI

  • Numeracy - Fast SQL editor with charts and dashboards for PostgreSQL (Commercial Software).

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Oct 27, 2018
entry.content:
Contents / Utilities

  • pgbadger (‚≠ê3.8k) - Fast PostgreSQL Log Analyzer.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Oct 24, 2018
entry.content:
Contents / Utilities

  • sqlcheck (‚≠ê2.5k) - Automatically detects common SQL anti-patterns. Such anti-patterns often slow down queries. Addressing them will, therefore, help accelerate queries.

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Mar 05, 2017
entry.content:
Contents / Backups

  • pg_probackup (‚≠ê742) ‚Äì A fork of pg_arman, improved by @PostgresPro, supports incremental backups, backups from replica, multithreaded backup and restore, and anonymous backup without archive command.

Contents / Extensions

  • PG_Themis (‚≠ê33) - Postgres binding as extension for crypto library Themis, providing various security services on PgSQL's side.

Contents / Extensions

  • cyanaudit - Cyan Audit provides in-database logging of all DML activity on a column-by-column basis.
  • pgxn PostgreSQL Extension Network - central distribution point for many open-source PostgreSQL extensions

Contents / Utilities

  • apgdiff - Compares two database dump files and creates output with DDL statements that can be used to update old database schema to new one.
  • ZSON (‚≠ê552) - PostgreSQL extension for transparent JSONB compression

entry.title: Awesome Postgres Updates on Nov 08, 2016
entry.content:
Contents / High-Availability

  • Patroni (‚≠ê7.5k) - Template for PostgreSQL HA with ZooKeeper or etcd.
  • Stolon (‚≠ê4.7k) - PostgreSQL HA based on Consul or etcd, with Kubernetes integration.
  • repmgr (‚≠ê1.6k) - Open-source tool suite to manage replication and failover in a cluster of PostgreSQL servers.

Contents / Backups

  • OmniPITR (‚≠ê181) - Advanced WAL File Management Tools for PostgreSQL.

Contents / GUI

  • Adminer - Full-featured database management tool written in PHP.
  • DataGrip - IDE with advanced tool sets and good cross-platform experience (Commercial Software).
  • Datazenit - Web-based PostgreSQL GUI (Commercial Software).
  • JackDB - Web-based SQL query interface (Commercial Software).
  • pgAdmin - PostgreSQL Administration and Management GUI.
  • pgweb (‚≠ê8.9k) - Web-based PostgreSQL database browser written in Go.
  • phpPgAdmin (‚≠ê825) - The Premier Web Based Administration Tool for PostgreSQL.
  • Postbird (‚≠ê1.6k) - PostgreSQL Client for macOS.
  • Postico - Modern PostgreSQL Client for macOS (Commercial Software).
  • PSequel - Clean and simple interface to perform common PostgreSQL tasks quickly (Commercial Software).
  • SQL Tabs - Cross Platform Desktop Client for PostgreSQL written in JS.
  • SQLPro for Postgres - Simple, powerful PostgreSQL manager for macOS (Commercial Software).

Contents / Monitoring

  • check_pgactivity (‚≠ê178) - check_pgactivity is designed to monitor PostgreSQL clusters from Nagios. It offers many options to measure and monitor useful performance metrics.
  • Check_postgres (‚≠ê578) - Nagios check_postgres plugin for checking status of PostgreSQL databases.
  • libzbxpgsql (‚≠ê156) - Comprehensive PostgreSQL monitoring module for Zabbix.
  • Pome (‚≠ê1.1k) - Pome stands for PostgreSQL Metrics. Pome is a PostgreSQL Metrics Dashboard to keep track of the health of your database.
  • pg_view (‚≠ê501) - Open-source command-line tool that shows global system stats, per-partition information, memory stats and other information.

Contents / Extensions

  • cstore_fdw (‚≠ê1.8k) - Columnar store for analytics with PostgreSQL.
  • pglogical (‚≠ê1.1k) - Extension that provides logical streaming replication.
  • pg_paxos (‚≠ê305) - Basic implementation of Paxos and Paxos-based table replication for a cluster of PostgreSQL nodes.
  • pg_shard (‚≠ê1.1k) - Extension to scale out real-time reads and writes.
  • PGStrom - Extension to offload CPU intensive workloads to GPU.
  • plpgsql_check (‚≠ê692) - Extension that allows to check plpgsql source code.
  • PostGIS - Spatial and Geographic objects for PostgreSQL.
  • zomboDB (‚≠ê4.7k) - Extension that enables efficient full-text searching via the use of indexes backed by Elasticsearch.

Contents / Optimization

  • PgHero (‚≠ê8.5k) - PostgreSQL insights made easy.
  • pgtune (‚≠ê1.1k) - PostgreSQL configuration wizard.

Contents / Utilities

  • ERAlchemy (‚≠ê1.2k) - ERAlchemy generates Entity Relation (ER) diagram from databases.
  • mysql-postgresql-converter (‚≠ê1.3k) - Lanyrd's MySQL to PostgreSQL conversion script.
  • ora2pg - Perl module to export an Oracle database schema to a PostgreSQL compatible schema.
  • pganalyze - PostgreSQL Performance Monitoring (Commercial Software).
  • pgCenter (‚≠ê1.6k) - Provides convenient interface to various statistics, management task, reloading services, viewing log files and canceling or terminating database backends.
  • pgclimb (‚≠ê391) - Export data from PostgreSQL into different data formats.
  • pgfutter (‚≠ê1.3k) - Import CSV and JSON into PostgreSQL the easy way.
  • PGInsight - CLI tool to easily dig deep inside your PostgreSQL database.
  • pgloader (‚≠ê5.9k) - Loads data into PostgreSQL using the COPY streaming protocol, and does so with separate threads for reading and writing data.
  • pgsync (‚≠ê3.3k) - Tool to sync PostgreSQL data to your local machine.
  • postgresql-metrics (‚≠ê596) - Tool that extracts and provides metrics for your PostgreSQL database.
  • yoke (‚≠ê1.3k) - PostgreSQL high-availability cluster with auto-failover and automated cluster recovery.

Resources / Tutorials

  • Backup and recover a PostgreSQL DB using wal-e - Tutorial about setting up continuous archiving in PostgreSQL using wal-e.
  • PG Casts - Free weekly PostgreSQL screencasts by Hashrocket.
  • Postgres Guide - Guide designed as an aid for beginners and experienced users to find specific tips and explore tools available within PostgreSQL.
  • PostgreSQL Exercises - Site to make it easy to learn PostgreSQL by doing exercises.
  • tutorialspoint PostgreSQL tutorial - Very extensive collection of tutorials on PostgreSQL

Resources / Blogs

  • Craig Kerstiens PostgreSQL posts - Set of posts on PostgreSQL cool features, tips and tricks.
  • Database Soup - Josh Berkus' blog.
  • select * from depesz; - Hubert Lubaczewski's blog.
